dt-example.title: Change SearchPanes Layout
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example demonstrates the `-init searchPanes.layout` option. This option allows you to define how many panes are displayed in one row before a new line is taken. The default is `auto` which will allow SearchPanes to determine the best fit.
